overview: Best Buds TJ And Ben arrived at CF having never imagined doing anything sexual with one another. That would change though, and Corbin Fisher's camera would capture everything! Relive the journey with TJ and Ben as these two sexy young studs and lifelong friends take their friendship and shared experiences to new levels, including taking turns fucking each other in this epic movie release from CF's archives that shows us a lifelong Best Bud will do anything for - and with - you!
title: Best Buds: TJ & Ben
